body:
Hey guys,
I'm new here but I was trying to view my stats on my profile but it keeps saying this, CALCULATING STATISTICS, PLEASE WAIT... anyone know why?
body_tagged:
Hey guys,
I'm new here but I was trying to view my stats on my profile but it keeps saying this, CALCULATING STATISTICS, PLEASE WAIT... anyone know why?
title: I try to vist my stats but it says this....

replies.body: I know but I don't know why it would take 3 hours....
replies.body_tagged: I know but I don't know why it would take 3 hours....

replies.body: it's a bug on the page, we already report it on github and they are working on fixing it (I hope) btw you can try avicus.net/WordlessGeek/stats
replies.body_tagged: it's a bug on the page, we already report it on github and they are working on fixing it (I hope) btw you can try avicus.net/WordlessGeek/stats

replies.body: It's an wierd Issue. It's not working for all new Members. You can wait till you die and they won't be calculated. Actually this is a bug. You have to post the Issue on Github or post a comment on an already posted Thread. https://github.com/Avicus/Issues/issues
replies.body_tagged: It's an wierd Issue. It's not working for all new Members. You can wait till you die and they won't be calculated. Actually this is a bug. You have to post the Issue on Github or post a comment on an already posted Thread. https://github.com/Avicus/Issues/issues

replies.body: maybe lots of statistics? or maybe it's dumb?
replies.body_tagged: maybe lots of statistics? or maybe it's dumb?

reply_to.body: I know but I don't know why it would take 3 hours....
reply_to.body_tagged: I know but I don't know why it would take 3 hours....

replies.body:
It is most likely your computer.

Either your computer cannot handle generating your statistics, or your internet is very bad.
replies.body_tagged:
It is most likely your computer.

Either your computer cannot handle generating your statistics, or your internet is very bad.

replies.body: It happened to me too when I first joined. I posted about it here: https://github.com/Avicus/Issues/issues and IvyCode (the dev/owner) fixed it for me. You might want to do the same. Goodluck!

replies.body: It's not either, My computer is custom built and is very OP and so is my internet.
